First to get Both of Sarah's feet bare wins.... and the loser gets a forfeit" "interesting... and what would your forfeit be when you lose??" Anne could hardly contain her excitement and her tone conveyed amusement. "My forfeit... well... how about... since you clearly like my bare feet... I'll let you have them for an hour... to do whatever you want with..." Maria paused and it had the desired effect, making Anne's thoughts drift wildly. "But if I win... I get yours for two hours" Anne didn't hesitate as she couldn't lose and they discussed the finer details. It was mutually agreed that in any dispute the person who held Sarah's socks would be the winner. "One final thing, what makes you so confident, Anne?" asked Maria. "Well I already got you barefoot didn't I?" "Yeah... but I'm an easy target... I love to be barefoot" the wink that Maria aimed with her final comment almost tipped Anne over the edge.
112212211.title: Sold out

1122122111.content:
It didn't take Sarah long to get the popcorn and drink, and the trip gave her some time to reflect. Her mind was drawn to Anne. Sarah hadn't expected her to be like this, so free spirited, and so youthful. There were two things that Sarah really admired about Anne. The first was her confidence, and the second was the way that she made herself comfortable and it ease in any situation. Sarah pondered whether Anne's perpetual barefootedness helped with this. Either way, she decided that it could be useful in helping her overcome her own uncharacteristic shyness around her feet.
As she opened the door to screen 5, Sarah could hear the other two giggling and was glad that they seemed to get along so well. She made a decision to try something that she'd thought about many times in the past. Sarah placed the popcorn and drink on the floor and carefully slipped her shoes off. She lifted her stockinged right foot and placed her index finger into the hem of the sock, dragging it away from her foot slowly. Once bare, she repeated the motion with her left foot. The thick plush carpet felt heavenly beneath her Soles and Sarah delighted in having had the guts to do it. She picked up her socks and put them in the back pocket of her jeans. She began making her way back to the others carrying her shoes along with the order.
As she reached the corner, Sarah bottled it. She dropped her shoes and slipped her feet inside. Still satisfied with telling herself that she had made progress, Sarah looked up to greet Anne and Maria. She saw two pairs of bare feet propped over the back of the seats in front, and headed towards them with a smile. "You took your time" said Anne. "Yeah... sorry... they were a bit busy" As Sarah settled back into her seat, the film began.
1122122111.title: Sarah returns

11221221111.content:
Sarah soon chose to make herself more comfortable, sitting back and putting her feet up on the chair in front. She was just relaxing when Maria poked her in the side. ""Hey, you shouldn't do that, it's rude" she whispered, pointing at Sarah's resting feet. "What?!" Replied Sarah "you're doing the same thing" "yeah, but my bare feet are clean (modelling them as she said it) and your shoes are dirty" Sarah sat for a moment before responding "fine..." she leaned forward and loosened the shoes before pulling them away from her heels and leaving them loosely covering her soles and toes. "Now only my clean bare feet will touch the seat" She said it mockingly and stuck her tongue out in Maria's direction, but her friend just grinned in response. Sarah had entirety missed the glances shared by Anne and Maria. Firstly one of excitement when her shoes appeared to be coming off, and another of confused interest when it became clear that she wasn't wearing socks. Both could swear she had been, and it wasn't like either to be wrong.
Having made a move, Maria decided not to push it for now, and Anne seemed caught up in the plot of the film. Sarah herself was warm and comfy, and found herself drifting. About an hour in to the film she was fast asleep. Anne quickly alerted Maria, and after checking she was right, they began plotting in hushed tones. They decided that it would be easy enough to explain that Sarah had kicked her shoes off whil asleep. Maria was first to physically react. Grabbing the shoes by the toe end and pulling them off. Sarah's toes wiggled as she adjusted to the cool air on her soles, but she stayed soundly sleeping. Maria clutched her prizes and waved them at Anne, mouthing "I won" and "2 hours" whilst motioned to Anne's feet. Anne feigned disappointment but she was happy to have lost. She also had an idea...
As the credits began to roll, Maria and Anne got up quietly and swiftly gathered their things before heading to the exit. They only stopped briefly to put their shoes back on, once they reached the door. Sarah awoke when the lights came on. It took her a minute to get her bearings, but she soon realised she was alone.... and barefoot. She must have dropped her shoes. She grabbed her phone to call Maria, and was greeted by a picture message from Anne, it was Maria, and she was holding Sarah's shoes....
11221221111.title: Maria wins

112212211112.content: Sarah heard the door open. “You’re hilarious...” she began. “Thanks...” was the response, but not from Maria as she expected. Instead there was a male usher stood at the bottom of the steps with a grin on his face. “...I do have to ask you to leave though, so I can clean up” “ha yeah sorry, I thought you were... someone else” Sarah suddenly panicked. She had no shoes, He would definitely notice she had no shoes. Should she put her socks back on... no it probably wouldn’t help. She’d still have no shoes, and just wearing socks was weirder than being barefoot she figured. He might think she was cool and rebellious. So she resisted reaching for her back pocket and instead stood and descended the stairs with her soles and toes on display. The usher watched her all the way. He was dark haired and tall with bright blue eyes she noticed as she caught his gaze. “Did you forget your shoes??” “No I wasn’t wearing any” she tried to sound aloof and cool. “Oh.... why not?” Sarah hadn’t expected any further questions and her thoughts didn’t come out clearly. “I don’... wear them... I mean... I’m comfy like this... my feet get... restricted” He just smiled as she floundered. “Well those shoes suit you perfectly.... and you forgot something else....” He handed her a scrap of paper as she walked past him and headed toward the exit. “Oh, ok... thanks” Sarah exited the room and was filled with relief, she had escaped the awkward situation without too much embarrassment and now had to catch up the others. She remembered the paper and unfolded it to see a name and phone number ‘Dan’
112212211112.title: Someone enters

113.content: "My friend Amy is having a BBQ. There'll be lots of food and drink... and maybe some cute young guys.... and she has a hot tub" Sarah thought this would be a good way to spend the afternoon. She got herself ready and dressed into Jean shorts and a thirty with ankle socks and converse. When she came down Anne was sat waiting. Anne had opted for a floral dress which hugged her figure exentuating the curves. She was barefoot, and slipped on some white ballet flats as the headed out the door. Sarah also carried a bag containing her bikini, a towel, and a hoody for later. They got in the car and Anne drove them to the supermarket to pick up some meat and alcohol. They agreed on rum and coke to wash down the food, and Anne called it her treat. Dhe knew she would get a treat of her own later. Annes friend lived in a large detached house in Alderley Edge and the back garden was spacious enough for a hot tub, a trampoline, a small shed containing fridge/freezer, and ample space for seating and cooking on the large double barbecue. As they pulled up they saw a driveway full of cars and a few had overspilled onto the surrounding roadside. Anne was pleased to see the party had begun.
113.title: "...to a bbq at my friend's house"

1131.content: Amy swung open the door and greeted the pair. She smiled warmly and embraced Anne. Sarah took in the petite brunette. She looked to be in her mid twenties and was clearly not sober. She wore a denim skirt and short sleeved lilac top. Her tanned legs and feet were bare and stretched as she stood on tiptoes hugging her taller friend. As the two friends caught up, Sarah scanned the house. The entrance opened into a reception area and large living room with patio doors leading out to the garden beyond. There were people spread throughout and Sarah noticed something strange. Of the fifteen people present, she could see only three males. That wasn't the only thing she noticed. Everybody present was barefooted. There wasn't a shoe or sock in sight. She saw a few people glancing her way and felt anxious at meeting so many new people in one go. "You go and enjoy, I'll show Sarah around" said Amy before releasing Anne and grabbing Sarah's left hand. "Hey Sarah let me give you the tour" "ok sure... thanks" Sarah looked back to see Anne disappearing into the crowd. Her ballet flats had been discarded and she walked lightly on her wrinkled soles.
1131.title: they join the party

11311.content: "Let's start upstairs" and Amy led the way. The two made small talk until they entered the master bedroom. Amy closed the door and sat on the king size bed motioning for Sarah to join her. No sooner had Sarah sat, than Amy was back on her feet. "Now..." she began, looking at the thick plush carpet. Sarah followed her gaze and realised that it wasn't the carpet Amy was staring at. As if on cue, Amy knelt and began untying the lace of the converse on Sarah's right foot. She spoke the entire time. "...my husband is very particular and we have a rule... a barefoot house rule.... so I'm sorry, but before we go any further I'll have to take these.... you'll notice that everyone else is following the rule, and if I let you off we'd both be in trouble" Amy had removed the first shoe and unlaced the second already. Sarah realised that she might as well accept this as she wouldn't win an argument. As her shoe joined it's partner on the floor Sarah stood an made to leave the room... only to be pushed back down by Amy's hand on her chest. "What are you doing? You have my shoes" "I do... but you mustn't have been listening... I said barefoot house rules. That means no shoes or socks... and you seem to have socks on" "oh sorry, I'm just really shy about my feet. Can't I keep them on?" "Hmm... OK I'll make you a deal.... take your socks off now and show me your bare feet, and if they aren't pretty I'll give you some slippers" Amy's eyes lit up as she saw Sarah's expression soften. "Come on, socks off!" She said in her most commanding tone. Sarah's resistance was broken. She reached her index finger under the elastic of the sock adorning her right foot. She pulled it down ... and then off. She lifted her left foot within reach and repeated the action. She now had two bare feet and two empty socks. At Amy's insistence she handed them over.
11311.title: the tour

113111.content: "Oh wow! Such lovely little feet... and so pale... they need more sun... well that can start today ha" Sarah blushed. Amy had mad valid points... "I didn't think anyone would see them..." "oh, I have the perfect thing for you..." Amy pulled open a drawer in her dresser- her jewellery drawer. She produced a thin silver anklet detailed with stars and moons. "Put this on... your left ankle I'd say... and please take your pick from these..." She indicated a vast array of nail polishes in all manner of styles and colours. Sarah did as instructed, fastening the anklet before picking a bright pink polish which had caught her eye. As Sarah walked over to the dresser, she felt the spongy carpet cushioning her soles. Amy smiled as she caught Sarah's expression. "It's a nice carpet isn't it" "Yeah... it's comfy" "Ha, well I'm always barefooted so it has to be" Amy winked with this remark, and Sarah couldn't help but smile. "Anyway we should get back to the party... hurry up painting those pretty little toes of yours" A few minutes later they made their way downstairs. Amy had some new arrivals to greet while Sarah snuck off into the crowd to find Anne. The anklet jingle with every step and she noticed it drawing attention.
113111.title: the tour continues

114.content:
They packed up Anne's car with towels, an improvised picnic, and beach accessories and set off. The drive took just over an hour, and by the time they arrived both were ready to get out into the glorious sunshine. They gathered the contents of the car boot and headed to a secluded spot between two dunes. As soon as they reached the sand Anne stepped out of her ballerina pumps, and burying her toes in the warm sand. "Ah, that's much better" Sarah caught a glimpse of the hot pink nail polish adorning Anne's toes and felt a pang of envy that her own feet were so restrained.
When the pair reached their chosen spot they laid down the towels and set down the rest of their things. Sarah sat on her towel, adjusted the position of her sunglasses an opened her magazine, but she was quickly distracted by Anne who wasted no time in stripping down to her bra and thong. "Don't be shy now" she said, laughing. Sarah had packed her bikini but was in no rush to remove her own clothes, and found herself blushing at the sight of her scantily clad companion. "I'm... o..k.." was all she could manage in response. This wasn't enough for Anne. She had been dreaming of Sarah's bare feet since the arrangement had been made, and she wasn't going to allow them to remain hidden at the beach. "At least let your feet have some freedom. They must be overheating in your shoes" With one fluid motion she bent, grabbed and pulled on Sarah's left shoe, prising it away from the socked foot. Before Sarah could react, the action was repeated, and Sarah sat stunned and shoeless, her pink ankle socks reflecting the bright summer sun. "Oh no, those will have to go too... we are at the beach after all" Sarah looked at her socks for a few seconds and decided that Anne was right and that she would be more comfortable barefoot, if she could just get over her embarrassment. Finally, with a shrug toward Anne, she peeled the sock from her right foot and tossed it onto the san, where it was swiftly joined by its partner. Her toes wiggled and Sarah allowed herself a smile as the sensations of the sunlight and a cooling breeze touched the freshly bared skin. Anne was now smiling broadly. "See, you're happier already!" The pair settled on their towels and began to bask in the late morning sun.
114.title: "...on a trip to the beach"

“But it’s the very first day of my Summer vacation! You can’t expect me to be in class one day and then go find a job the next! It’s, it’s inhuman!”, whines pretty Sarah.

“You’re Mum was adamant that we at least go have a look, Sarah. You’ll have plenty of time for fun while they’re away, but imagine how proud she’ll be if you find a job right after they leave. Now, hurry upstairs and get cleaned up. I know a lady with a boutique who might love having a pretty girl like yourself to help her around the shop”, replies the older woman before sipping from her tea.

“It’s for your own good”, Anne tells her, still relaxing in the kitchen area.

While upstairs, Sarah hears the downstairs shower turn on and hatches a plan to get back at her Mom’s friend with a harmless prank.

124.content:
Sarah sneaks downstairs and into the kitchen. She spots Anne's discarded ballet flats, and decides to hide them. Sliding her feet out of her slippers, and into a pair of her own flats, Sarah heads outside and into the garden. Here she places Anne's shoes under a bush, out of sight.
As Sarah re-enters the house she hears the shower being turned off and walks over to the sofa to watch some tv. Anne soon comes down dressed in skinny jeans, and a whit tank top, showing off her incredible figure. She wanders into the kitchen and looks around, not seeng what she desires, she checks the porch before returning to the living room. Anne seats herself on the sofa, next to Sarah. She reaches down and grabs Sarah's ankles, pulling the feet up onto her lap.
"What are you doing?!" queries Sarah. "Well" says Anne with a mischevious grin "my shoes seem to have gone missing whilst I was in the shower, and seeing as theres only you around, I thought you might know where they went..." Oh thats strange, I dont kn..." Sarah stops horrified as Anne has pulled the shoe from her right foot and is looking intently at the freshly bared sole. "Now until my shoes are returned, we will both stay barefoot"
Anne is struggling to contain her glee that she has been presented with such an opportunity to enjoy the young girl's feet. Sarah, meanwhile, is worried. This turns to panic as Anne announces "ok we're going out"
124.title: •	Hides Anne’s shoes/purse

1241.content:
Sarah can't believe that she is being forced to go out on public barefoot with this crazy woman... What if her friends see? However she figures they,ll probably just head to the nearest shoe shop to buy some replacements for Anne.
Sarah feels the warmth of the tarmac underfoot as she walks over to Anne's car, only to be stopped in her tracks. "No my dear, we'll be walking" calls Anne cheerfully. Sarah's heart sinks as she looks down at her pretty little toes, so unused to being exposed. Knowing any argument would be futile, she walks over to Anne and they set off.
The walk takes abut half an hour and Anne is chatting the whole way, putting Sarah at ease, and she starts to forget being barefooted. This changes when they reach the mall and Sarah becomes conscious of people admiring their choice of footwear. Sarah is surprised by the fact that the trip does not include a trip to a shoe store, and instead they visit other shops, trying on clothes, and testing make up. She is even more surprised by how much she enjoys herself, and as they sit down for coffee, she tells Anne so. After a few hours, and a couple of minor purchases, they set off home.
1241.title: The Mall

choices: Let Sarah clean her own feet
12411.content:
As the two began their long trek home, Anne's desire for the young girl's feet had reached a breaking point. Although she thoroughly enjoyed admiring Sarah barefoot, particularly the way she attempted to hide her bare feet from the general public, Anne decided it was time for her to claim those beautiful feet for herself. But how would she go about it?

This question soon answered itself, as Sarah stopped to examine the bottom of one of her soles, which had accumulated quite a bit of dirt and grime, among other random particles, along the course of their journey. "What's wrong, my dear?" asked Anne in a caring tone. "Nothing" said Sarah "It's just my feet are really tired from walking so much, and now they're really dirty". "Oh, well we can't have that, now can we? Sit down and I'll take care of them for you." Anne said while motioning to a nearby bench. Sarah was a little nervous about someone touching her feet, especially out in public, but she did as she was told. Without even asking, Anne lifted Sarah's foot into her lap and examined the bottom of her sole. Sarah was correct, her feet were positively filthy from walking around barefoot. "Oh my!" said Anne, pretending to be grossed out by Sarah's foot. Sarah blushed, as she was not used to someone being in such close proximity to her bare feet, especially given their current condition. Anne began to press her thumbs into Sarah's sole, and Sarah let out a slight giggle. Anne could not believe how ticklish this girl is. Sarah quickly tried to regain her composure, as her laugh had attracted the eyes of some random strangers, and Sarah was already quite embarrassed at being barefoot in public. Anne went to work on her other sole, gently kneading the soft flesh with her thumbs while fighting back the urge to tickle this girl unmercifully.

"Does that feel any better?" Anne asked gently.

"Yes ma'am" Sarah said, eager to remove her feet from the older woman's lap.

"Wait, what are you doing, my dear? Your feet are still all dirty. You must let me do something about it."

Sarah looked confused. What did she mean 'do something about it'. She need not ponder this question anymore, as Anne brought Sarah's foot up to her face and licked it from bottom to top, savoring the dirt and sweat that fell into her mouth.

"What the hell!" screamed Sarah, clearly outraged that Anne would go as far as to lick her foot in public.

"Your feet are dirty." said Anne. "You said so yourself. And plus, there is no water around here to wash your feet off."

"So that just means you can lick my feet?!" Sarah quickly retorted.

"If you're uncomfortable having your feet cleaned here, you'll have to wait til we get home to wash the dirt off."

"That's fine." Sarah said adamantly.

The two began walking home. Sarah, who was still in kind of a state of shock given the previous events, began walking faster. Anne was fine with this, as she could admire her young houseguest's feet from behind. When they finally arrived at the house, Sarah began to head upstairs to the bathroom.

"And just where do you think you're going?" Anne asked.

"Uh... I'm going to wash off my feet? Remember?"

"Yes, I know that. But remember, you hid my shoes, which means in addition to remaining barefoot for the rest of the day, you aren't allowed to use the washtub either."

"What!?" screamed Sarah "First you make me walk around barefoot, then you lick my feet, and now I can't even wash my feet off in my own house. What's wrong with you?"

"I never said you couldn't wash your feet off" said Anne in a calm, polite manner. "I simply said you could not use the washtub. Now I remember you did not particularly like me cleaning your feet off, so I will let you decide. You may allow me clean your feet off using my mouth, or you may do so yourself."
12411.title: Foot Massage

Sarah is an eighteen year old who lives on the outskirts of Manchester in England. She lives with her parents who are well off, in a large detached house, within a friendly neighbourhood. Sarah is a little spoilt, but is popular.

The story begins at the start of the summer holidays. This will be Sarah's last before she moves away to university. Her parents are about to set off on an around the world cruise, and will be gone for a month. Because they do not fully trust Sarah, her mother's friend Anne will be coming to stay.
